branchCategory.name: LEFG, Support Guide, Ball Screw/Belt Drive
branchCategory.description: <p>An LEFG guide shares dimensions with the LEFS and LEFB body, but has no motor. It functions as a support for a significantly overhanging workpiece that is moved by a driving slider. The guide is equipped with a seal band that prevents the ingress of grease and other external foreign matter. A typical application is in support of a large loading platform in a multi-axis pick-and-place operation</p>

breadCrumb.name: LEFG, Support Guide, Ball Screw/Belt Drive
